input.sentences: we decided to go down to the dike for the day .
we were able to look through this scope and see that little island out there .
the family decided to take a break and just relax watching the shore .
we found these interesting little plants | i wonder what it is called .
there were many birds out and about wanting our food .
output.sentences: As the man strolled near the dike, he decided to spend the day there.
He glanced through the scope toward the island in the distance.
He joined another man watching the waves lap against the shore, and began to relax.
There were some plants along the shoreline. The man found these to be unusual, and didn't know what they were called.
He soon discovered that the fruit of the plants provided food for the birds.
